home.hero_desc: Upload your prescription and get instant analysis of medicines, dosages, and potential interactions. We help you understand your medications better and ensure safe usage.
home.services_desc: We help you understand your prescriptions better and ensure safe medication usage
home.how_desc: Get your prescription analyzed in 3 simple steps
home.how_upload_desc: Take a clear photo of your prescription and upload it
home.how_ai_desc: Our AI analyzes the prescription and extracts key information
home.how_results_desc: View detailed analysis with medicine info and safety checks
home.feature_secure_desc: Your prescriptions and medical data are encrypted and handled with utmost privacy.
home.feature_ai_desc: Leverage cutting-edge AI for precise and comprehensive prescription analysis.
home.feature_fast_desc: Get instant analysis results within seconds, saving your valuable time.
home.feature_support_desc: Our dedicated support team is always ready to assist you around the clock.
home.contact_desc: Have questions? We're here to help
home.newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for health tips and updates
home.footer_rights: All rights reserved. Made with ❤️ by Team Malaai (Khusbu Rai & Pushpender Singh).

register.password_hint: Use at least 8 characters with a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols
